q: Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. ''Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time,'' he said. I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. We're going to go out and try to have fun and everybody enjoy each other. Michael Vick looked sharp and fluid as he completed a 20-yard out to Arizona Cardinals receiver Larry Fitzgerald . On the next play, Michael Vick faked a handoff to Adrian Peterson and then hit Falcons tight end Tony Gonzalez going

out of the box.'' Reid said the late success has something to do with figuring out on the fly how to counter the unusual things teams are coming up with to defend Michael Vick . I think we're making good adjustments as players and coaches; I like to do that sooner than later, Reid said. ''We're getting some unique looks. The know-how in Turin is not possible to emigrate, added Vitali, noting FIM had requested a meeting with Sergio Marchionne next week. In contrast to FIM's more conciliatory stance, hardline union FIOM has urged a workforce presence at this weekend's meeting.

that phone hacking was carried out by a couple of rogue employees. David Cameron said that he was very sorry Andy Coulson had quit, and believed his claim that he was ignorant of the spying. Andy Coulson resigned from the News of the World when he found out what was happening, David Cameron said. ''I've always felt he's been punished for the same offense twice.'' The weekly News of the World has a circulation of more than 3 million and thrives on celebrity exclusives

We're going into the next game with some confidence. We're on a back-to-back so it's important for us to go get our rest and get ready to play. It's going to be a good measuring stick for us.
